apps.title: Weather KSN16 KODE12
apps.description: Never let the weather catch you by surprise again. The trusted weather experts at KSN and KODE are teaming up to bring you the most accurate hour-by-hour forecast for the next day and for the week ahead. Unlike other weather apps, you’ll get a local forecast that is customized just for you. Download the 4StatesWx Weather app for fast, accurate local and national weather at your fingertips. With its personal alert notifications, you’ll know when significant weather is heading your way and when to take cover. When you are traveling, use 4StatesWx to get real-time weather forecast, interactive radar and current conditions for anywhere in U.S. The 4StatesWx app utilizes the most advanced radar maps, weather and digital technology available. With its easy to use interactive radar, you can take control and see where the storm is now and where it is tracking. Then, set customized alerts to keep you and your family informed and safe.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Update to the mapping background in the radar tile and page to give it a new modern look. Boundaries, roads, cities display on top of radar data to make it easier to view your location on the map.
New look to the current conditions and forecast tile to make it more modern looking and easier for users to read weather data. Changes include a white background, colored icons, and larger text to make data easier to read.
Updated Current Conditions/Forecast Page. Updates include:
 -Page opens to the ‘Overview’ tab which gives current conditions, 3 hour hourly forecast, the 7 day daily forecast, and access to the radar page
 -The 'Currents' tab will give additional information on humidity percent, cloud cover, visibility, dew point, barometric pressure, and sunrise/sunset times.
 -The 'Hourly' tab will give detailed weather information for the next 24 hours on the forecasted weather condition, temperature, pop and wind speed and direction.
 -The 'Daily' tab will show the 7-day forecast in a manner that is much more similar to on-air 7-day forecasts with a detailed forecast for the next 7 days/nights below.

apps.title: Yr.no
apps.description:
New Yr on iPhone and iPad is different from anything else you’ve seen in weather forecasting: Scroll through a beautiful and animated sky to see how the weather changes hourly, and get all the need-to-know details at the same time. And if there will be rainfall within the next 90 minutes we'll let you know through our now-cast.

The weather visualization makes it a fun experience to check the weather – even when it’s raining!

Check details day by day and hour by hour in the long-term forecast, or study the details in the graph.

Under "Around you" you get an overview of air pollution, pollen spread and UV forecast, as well as the latest weather observations in your area.

Forecasts are delivered by the Norwegian Meteorological Institute.

ABOUT US: Yr is a weather service jointly produced by NRK and the Norwegian Meteorological Institute. Our primary goals are to secure life and property, while delivering useful and accurate weather forecasts to our users, preparing them for all kinds of weather. This year we are celebrating our ten-year anniversary, and with millions of users every day we are proud of being one of the most popular weather services in the world.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Updated limits for nowcast.
- Updated aurora forecast.
- Updated weather symbols.

apps.title: eWeather HD - Weather & Alerts
apps.description:
The World's only iPhone, Apple Watch and iPad weather app specifically designed to provide all the info you need in one place. It's designed to look beautiful and work beautifully! 
eWeather HD provides a lot of features, but not at the loss of elegant display simplicity. Get accurate and reliable 24-hour and 15-day weather forecast utilizing unique multi-provide system, future radar images, severe weather alerts, earthquakes, air quality, storm/typhoon tracks combined with data from NOAA buoys, sea surface temperatures, historical weather data and climate averages, tide predictions and much more…
 
Key features:

▸ 15-day, hour-by-hour local and international weather forecasts 
▸ Instant severe weather alerts using PUSH (U.S. & Europe)
▸ High-Resolution Doppler, Predictive (Future) Weather Radar (rain+snow)
▸ Global storm, typhoon, cyclone tracks and future paths
▸ Lightning Tracker
▸ Live temperature on home screen badge
▸ Four Home screen widgets including Animated Weather Clock and Barometer
▸ Animated Today Extension Widgets: Actual weather with barometric pressure trend, hour-by-hour, day-by-day forecast 
▸ Four visual themes
▸ Dark mode support
▸ Siri shortcuts with 9 commands
▸ iMessage app
▸ Spotlight
▸ Realtime barometer (uses sensor in iPhone/iPad)
▸ Barometric pressure trends (+/- 24 hours)
▸ Barometric pressure PUSH alerts (migraine detector)
▸ Actual weather conditions in PUSH notifications
▸ Air quality index, details, maps and forecasts
▸ Geomagnetic activity
▸ Earthquakes
▸ Satellite cloud animations (U.S., Europe and Asia)
▸ Sun/Moon times, Moon phase & day
▸ Tide predictions, tide charts, high and low tide times
▸ Near-realtime data from over 700 NOAA buoys, beach & global sea surface temperatures (wind, wave details and etc.)
▸ Global sea surface t°
▸ Astronomical events (Solar, Lunar eclipses, Equinox, Solstice and etc.)
▸ Animated weather, wind maps
▸ 365-day Long-range weather forecast and climate data
▸ Beautiful Apple Watch weather App with complications

Details:

• 15-day weather forecast including
- Day/night conditions
- Wind speed and direction
- Probability of precipitation (rain or snow)
- Rainfall, snowfall amounts
- Sunrise, sunset, day length and difference, moonrise, moonset, Moon day & phase
- UV index, geomagnetic activity

• Hourly weather forecast for the next 24 hours
- Temperature and feels like t°
- Humidity, Dew point
- Probability of precipitation (rain or snow)
- Rainfall and snowfall amounts
- Wind speed, direction
- UV index
- Geomagnetic activity

• Current weather conditions
- Temperature and feels like t°
- Humidity
- Pressure of air
- Realtime data from air pressure sensor
- Wind speed, direction
- Dew point
- t° of water

√ Helps you to plan your outdoor activities with the amazing accuracy. Just take a look at the Weather Clock and you’ll be secured against any weather surprises

√ Alerts about the weather that triggers Migraine Headaches (PUSH). Now you always know the cause of headaches or migraines if it is linked with changes in the pressure of air

√ Can alert you to potentially life threatening weather (hail, tornado, hurricane, flood, thunderstorm and etc.) via audible push notifications directly to your device even if your device is asleep and locked

√ Can minimize the harm to your property and protect your personal safety

√ Weather Clock interface can tell you at a glance exactly when it will rain/snow

√ Provides up-to-minute weather forecast for the next 24 hours (8 types of data)

√ Daily weather data & sea t° for last 5 years

√ Uses two weather providers (located in the US and EU) to bring you precise weather forecasts. Multi-provider system lets you choose the most accurate weather data for your location

√ Includes interactive weather maps: actual and future weather, lightning, radar, storm tracks and affected areas, severe-weather alerts, sea surface temperatures, ocean buoys, satellite cloud cover animations, earthquakes, air pollution, tide predictions

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using eWeather HD app! 
This release fixes the following issues: Barometric pressure sensor may not display realtime air pressure on some devices running iOS 17.4 and higher.
We recommend updating to this version for the most accurate air pressure readings!

- t° of water

√ Helps you to plan your outdoor activities with the amazing accuracy. Just take a look at the Weather Clock and you’ll be secured against any weather surprises

√ Alerts about the weather that triggers Migraine Headaches (PUSH). Now you always know the cause of headaches or migraines if it is linked with changes in the pressure of air

√ Can alert you to potentially life threatening weather (hail, tornado, hurricane, flood, thunderstorm and etc.) via audible push notifications directly to your device even if your device is asleep and locked

√ Can minimize the harm to your property and protect your personal safety

√ Weather Clock interface can tell you at a glance exactly when it will rain/snow

√ Provides up-to-minute weather forecast for the next 24 hours (8 types of data)

√ Daily weather data & sea t° for last 5 years

√ Uses two weather providers (located in the US and EU) to bring you precise weather forecasts. Multi-provider system lets you choose the most accurate weather data for your location

√ Includes interactive weather maps: actual and future weather, lightning, radar, storm tracks and affected areas, severe-weather alerts, sea surface temperatures, ocean buoys, satellite cloud cover animations, earthquakes, air pollution, tide predictions

apps.title: Weather and wind map
apps.description:
Planning a day at the beach or a boating trip?  Are you curious about what the water temperature is at your favorite place to swim? World Weather Map HD is the fastest, easiest-to-use, weather application that displays current weather conditions and sea surface temperature directly on the map. 

The app is amazing for exploring weather and planning trips and recreation and allows you to easily pan and zoom so you can get unmatched detail of weather in your neighborhood or half a world away. 

Additional information, presented in pop-up window, includes “feels like temperature”,  humidity, local time,  sunset/sunrise time, wind speed, wind direction and ten-day weather forecast.


Key Features: 

•  World sea surface temperatures (New!)
•  Enhanced animated weather maps 10-day/24 hour weather forecast  (New!)
•  Provides current weather conditions and a weather forecast up to 10 days ahead for cities all over the world 
•  Provides sea surface temperature based on buoys and satellite maps
•  Provides zoom and pan functionality 
•  Supports Fahrenheit and Celsius
• Provides useful information for Fisherman, Divers, Surfers, Sailors, Lifeguards, boaters, and anyone that needs to know the water temperatures near them.
Features include: 

• Interactive world weather map 
• Current weather conditions and temperatures on top of the interactive maps 
• Long-term 10-day weather forecast 
• Hour-by-hour weather forecast 

• more than 130 000 world cities 
• Scroll over top of maps to find weather around the world 
• "follow-me" for the weather nearby your location 
• unlimited number of favorite locations 
• weather data by WSI Corp. and Foreca.com 

Specifications: 

• Localized in 38 languages

raw_data.releaseNotes:
The update adds support for iOS 12 and iPhone X, iPad PRO devices taking full advantage of the new screen size. 
Fixed issues with pop-up windows on iOS 12.

apps.title: Drive Weather with Live Radar
apps.description:
Outsmart The Weather - The Drive Weather app keeps you safe, prepared, and stress-free on the road ahead.

Drive Weather helps you travel smarter by showing exactly where and when you’ll encounter hazardous weather along your route. Use as a stand alone app or with CarPlay it brings real-time route based forecasts to your dashboard, so you can avoid surprises and make better decisions on the road.

The app visualizes weather, wind speed and direction, temperature, radar, and National Weather Service alerts, including watches, warnings, and advisories, all based on your chosen departure time. Whether you're navigating a quick trip or a cross-country drive, Drive Weather helps you see conditions before they happen.

What makes Drive Weather different? Its clean, intuitive interface transforms complex weather data into a glanceable timeline, helping you quickly spot the safest time to leave and the best route to take. Avoid headwinds, reduce fuel costs, and stay ahead of dangerous conditions - deal for truckers, RVers, Bikers, and road trippers alike.

Drive Weather offers significantly richer weather data than other travel-weather apps. It draws from a far greater number of forecast weather locations - giving you much more precise, granular insight into upcoming weather conditions. This dense coverage means you'll know exactly what to expect at every part of your route.

Only Drive Weather offers split-screen CarPlay integration - displaying live weather conditions alongside turn-by-turn navigation. This exclusive feature makes Drive Weather the only app that lets you see both your route and the weather you're about to drive into, simultaneously. No switching apps. No guessing. Just the critical information you need, where and when you need it most.


FREE FEATURES: 
• Apple CarPlay app enabled for Weather, Storm Radar, and Navigation
• High Resolution Weather Locations - See More Weather and Make Better Decisions. 
• Weather - Rain, Snow, Fog, Freezing Rain, Tornados, Thunderstorms, Hail, Smoke, & Haze 
• Temperatures 
• Animated Live Radar 
• Cloud Cover Forecast 
• Time Tweaker for Truckers and RVers 
• Free Version has ads, provides up to 2 days of weather forecast. 
• Area Weather for general weather 
• All data saves on close and reopening 
• Automatically updates weather forecasts road conditions such as rain, freezing rain, snow, and fog to your Car Play screen or iPhone while on the road 


PRO FEATURES - All the above plus: 
• Icy Pavement Indicator 
• Wind Speed and Direction, Gusts and sustained 
• Night Location Indicator 
• 7 Days of Weather Forecast 
• Compare Routes 
• Severe Weather Alerts - Weather Warnings, Watches, & Advisories
• Ad Free 
• Unlimited Route Length 
• Add Stops on Your Route
• Add Waypoints 
• Weather Filtering 
• Fully Interactive Interface for Better Road Trip Planning. 
• Automatically updates weather forecasts conditions such as rain, freezing rain, snow, fog, potential ice indicator to your CarPlay screen or iPhone while on the road 



DRIVE WEATHER COVERAGE:
United States, Canada, Mexico, South America, UK, & Europe


Note: Not supported on laptops. Comments, Questions, Feedback? Email us at conceptElementsApp@gmail.com

apps.title: OpenWeather
MeteoSwiss
apps.description:
Intuitive, personalised and innovative: the MeteoSwiss app is your comprehensive companion for all weather information in Switzerland – compact and always up to date.

Get updates on weather forecasts, current measurements, and federal natural hazard warnings. Subscribe to natural hazard warnings as push notifications for your locations, and customize the warning types and thresholds according to your preferences.

Stay informed with informative blog posts on weather and climate topics.
 

Detailed features:

Weather Forecasts
• Weather on-site with a 5-hour forecast for your location
• Local forecasts for all places/ZIP codes in Switzerland with an overview for the next 8 days
• Wind/temperatures at different altitudes
• Weather report for the three language regions of Switzerland, as well as possible developments for the following week, European isobar map, and road condition forecast

Weather Animations
• Measurements and forecasts of precipitation, precipitation type, wind, temperature and clouds
• Hail reporting function
• Satellite images

Natural Hazard Warnings
• All warnings on natural hazards from the Federal Authorities (severe weather, floods, avalanches, earthquakes and forest fire)
• Warning area overview on an interactive map
• Federal natural hazard bulletin
• Subscribeable warnings as push notifications for locations and warning types with individual warning thresholds
 
Current Measurements
• Overview of weather stations on an interactive map and list view
• Selection of various measurement data with up to 10-minute updates

Your Locations
• Search for all places/ZIP codes in Switzerland
• An easy overview of your locations: The app keeps an organised list of your relevant locations.

Meteo Reports
• Display of submitted reports and images for specific weather events from users of the MeteoSwiss app

Sports & Health
• Pollen forecast
• UV index
• Air quality
• Snow depth and fresh snow forecast

MeteoSwiss Blog
• Daily updated posts and information on weather and climate

Aviation Weather (available through in-app purchase)
• METAR/TAF Switzerland
• Aviation weather warnings Switzerland
• Windanimations Switzerland on different FL
• GAFOR Switzerland
• Text forecasts for powered flight, gliding and ballooning
• Low Level SWC Alps and Europe
• Pressure difference
• QNH – Chart
• W / T – Chart
• Wind – Barbs
• Regtherm
• Trajectories
• Emagramms

Legal basis
https://www.meteoswiss.admin.ch/about-us/legal-basis.html

apps.title: OpenPet - Virtual AI Pet
apps.description:
AD-FREE: Just clear skies and weather.

PRECISE: Every forecast delivered with pinpoint accuracy.

CUTE: Meet the fluffiest meteorologist ever.

CUSTOMIZABLE: Focus only on the weather details that matter to you.

STUNNING GRAPHICS: Superior graphics, crisp and beautiful on all devices.
___

Experience the thrill of weather updates with OpenPet, a 100% free app that transforms routine weather checks into pure joy. Imagine opening the app to a tiny, eager ball of fur ready to share the day’s weather.

Customize the app to display only the weather details important to you.

AVAILABLE WIDGETS:
- 10-Day Forecast
- Precipitation Map
- Wind Speed and Direction
- Sunrise & Sunset Times
- UV Index
- Air Quality Levels
- Moon Phase
- Humidity Levels
- Historical Temperature Trends
- Severe Weather Alerts
- Home & Lock Screen Widgets

...and we’re just getting warmed up! OpenPet is more than just an app, it's a delightful companion that brightens your day, rain or shine. Ready to charm its way onto your device and into your heart, OpenPet makes checking the weather a joyful and adorable adventure.

Fall in love with weather updates anew with OpenPet – your FREE, personal, fluffy weather guide!

Privacy Policy: https://openpet.com/privacy-policy/
Terms: https://openpet.com/terms-of-use/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements: we've fixed various issues to make everything run faster and more reliably.

New in this update:

- Introducing Levels – clearer, more vivid progress bars and success metrics for both you and your Kitty in our open world. The more you interact with PetWeather, the greater your impact!
- Walking beyond the windowsill – the new Travel Mode lets you earn and spend your Happy Index on journeys. Your Kitty will return from each trip with something special to share.
- Kitty Wishes – your cat now speaks through redesigned daily challenges. Listen closely, complete them, and keep your Kitty happy.
- My Goals – take control of your own routine: create personal tasks, set reminders, and shape the day your way.

From the previous release:

- Better weather – overall experience improved.
- Social tweaks – you can now delete posts, plus enjoy more colorful envelopes.
- Reactions – see who smiled, laughed, or sent love to your letters and posts.
- New Contacts screen – all your followers and friends gathered in one cozy place.
- Expanded user profiles – send a direct letter, check their weather, and explore all their posts.

apps.title: Storm Tracker°
apps.description:
Track LIVE Storm’s Activity; Check the Weather updates, radar, and get warnings. Follow the storm’s path and its development NOW, and days ahead. Be well-informed.

STORM TRACKER - EXTREME WEATHER RADAR
Accurate, reliable, and easy-to-navigate Storm Tracker with 1.4M downloads worldwide.
The storm tracker app provides 24/7 real-time tracking of several weather patterns like heavy storms, tornadoes, hurricanes, typhoons, tropical storms, cyclones, and other severe weather conditions.

FREE ACCESS TO STORM TRACKER
Needful Weather Information;
• Rain & Snow Radar - Doppler info
• 24/7 NOAA Weather Warnings & Alerts on maps for floods, tides, and storms (US only)
• Weather charts for temperature, precipitation, wind speed, and pressure information
• Detailed Hourly forecasts, up to 10 days
• HD quality map
• Unlimited Locations

SUPPORTED COUNTRIES AND REGIONS
NORTH AMERICA: United States*, Canada, Mexico
EUROPE: France, United Kingdom, Germany, Spain, Portugal, Netherlands, Switzerland, Norway, Sweden, Finland, Denmark
APAC: Japan, Hong Kong, Korea, Taiwan & Australia
*Frequent severe weather conditions coverage in Florida, Texas, Alabama, Oklahoma, Kansas, Louisiana, Arkansas, Georgia, Mississippi, North and South Carolina

SUBSCRIBE TO PREMIUM ACCESS
• Hurricane tracker
• Rain Radar; Future precipitation forecasts
• Wind Tracker; Map with animated wind direction with a 12-day windy forecast
• Ad-free Experience

Subscriptions automatically renew each month 24 hours before the end of the current period and your iTunes account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from within the app. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription. Terms & Conditions: https://impalastudios.com/terms Privacy Policy: https://impalastudios.com/privacy

UNITS OF MEASUREMENT
Fahrenheit/Celsius | Miles/Kilometers | Wind speed in kN, mph, km/h, Beaufort | Barometric Pressure in Inches (inHG) and Atmospheric Pressure in Hectopascal (hPa)

YOUR EXPERIENCE IS IMPORTANT TO US!
*Please check if the answers are available in the Frequently Asked Questions app Settings. *(FQA)
Our support team is very happy with your feedback, questions, and suggestions and is always ready to help you via support@impalastudios.com.

Storm Tracker (C) 2014 Impala Studios

raw_data.releaseNotes: This version includes general performance improvements and bug fixes.

apps.title: Gismeteo lite
CBS 42 - AL News & Weather
apps.description:
News has never been more local than in the palm of your hand. The CBS 42 News mobile app brings you all the top stories from our daily broadcasts, as well as stories developing in real time.

CBS 42 News delivers in-depth, community-first journalism, along with Storm Team weather updates and real-time traffic. With the revamped CBS 42 News app, you're getting "Local Coverage You Can Count On" from Central Alabama's top trusted news team.

FEATURES:
• Watch video of your trusted reporters on the scene, and read revealing articles on what's going on in your community.

• Plan your day and week with detailed weather conditions, live alerts of severe conditions, and an interactive radar map.

• Optional alerts on breaking news keep you in the know.

• On the go? Save stories for later to access at your convenience.

apps.title: AWeather - Avanti Weather
apps.description:
Avanti Weather, or AWeather for short, is a weather app for iDevices (iPhones, iPads, and iPods) that lets you manage weather forecasts from NOAA (the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration) and the National Weather Service (NWS) while you're on the go and away from the internet. Weather data can be downloaded for multiple locations when you have a net connection and can be viewed later whether you have a net connection or not. In addition to using the accurate NOAA/NWS forecast data, you can get the forecast for where you want it and not only for major metropolitan locations.

The app supports larger text for Accessibility.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Thank you for using AWeather. Because we value your time, we don't interrupt you in the app to ask for a review. If you have a couple of minutes, please leave a rating and review on the App Store. It will make a huge difference to us.

apps.title: 6abc Philadelphia
apps.description:
Get breaking news alerts and watch Action News with the 6abc Philadelphia app. Stay updated on local news and AccuWeather, as well as national stories from Philadelphia's most trusted news source. Customize the app based on your interests.

WATCH
- Watch Action News Live on the 24/7 streaming channel
- Find exclusive video clips and watch Action News on demand
- Use the “picture in picture” feature to watch live video while you use other apps on your phone

EXPLORE
- Search news topics using the explore section

WEATHER
- Easily choose your locations to get hourly conditions and the 7-day forecast
- StormTracker6 Radar maps along with detailed weather information
- Get weather and traffic alerts for severe conditions so you’re always up-to-date before you head out

MY NEWS
- Stay informed on stories that matter to you by choosing topics you care about
- "My News" builds a unique feed just for you based on the interests and locations you choose
- Choose customized alerts for topics and locations you care about, from entertainment news to sports updates and everything in between

Your California Privacy Rights - https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-california-privacy-rights/

apps.title: Weather Kitty: Weather + Radar
apps.description:
Smile every time you check the weather! The cats change based on the weather and time. You can even add your own kitty! 

Features 
- Over 1000 kittens organized into 17 themes: Original (free), #CrazyCatArt (free), Yoga Cats, Summer Fun, Fall Colors, Halloween, Holiday, Winter Wonder, Springy, Glamour, Kitty Love, Sphynx, Persians, Bengals, Big Cats, Hide 'N' Seek & Cats & Dogs.
- Use photos of your cat to create your own theme (premium add-on)
- Share your kitten with friends on Facebook, Instagram & Twitter 
- Weather forecasts from around the world 
- 7 day weather forecast 
- Hourly weather
- Today's high and low, feels like, humidity, wind, sunrise/set and more 
- Animated Radar
- Severe weather alerts (in-app)

The weather has never been cuter!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you decide to subscribe to Meow Prime to access all content, use the add your own cat theme, and remove ads - the following will apply:
* You'll be charged once a month or once a year depending on the subscription option you choose.
* Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
* Your subscription will automatically renew unless you turn off auto-renewal at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
* Your account will be charged within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Current subscriptions start at $0.99 a month. Prices are in US Dollars and may vary in outside of the US.
* You can manage your subscription and renewal settings, or discontinue your subscription by going to Account Settings after purchase.
* Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase the subscription.

Terms of Use: http://weatherkittyapp.com/terms.html 
Privacy Policy: http://weatherkittyapp.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use End User Licensing Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
